blocks.caption: Cooling curve for a metal plate.
blocks.description: The figure illustrates the inverse relationship between temperature and time during the cooling process. As time progresses, the temperature decreases non-linearly, indicating that cooling rate slows over time.

blocks.text: Inverse curve relates to: (a) horizontal and 0 vertical. To obtain this curve from curve (a), the points must be very carefully calculated, and it must be remembered that these values are the measures of the inclination to the vertical axis and not to the horizontal, thus, e.g., values of \(d\text{t}\) and not \(d\text{u}\).
